addons.description:
Provides an easy way to browse and view movie and TV show extras. Extras can be accessed from the context menu in the video library. By default, the add-on will look in the "Extras" sub-folder for content (can be changed in settings).

Tip: for how to avoid extras beings scraped to library, see http://kodi.wiki/view/Add-on:Extras
addons.name: context.item.extras

addons.description: Keymap Editor is a GUI for configuring mappings for remotes, keyboard and other inputs supported by Kodi. Note: existing user defined key mappings will be renamed to .bak.
addons.name: script.keymap
addons.news:
v1.1.3
- Added support for v19 Matrix
- Fix so script only backups user defined keymaps if trying to save new keymap file
- Moved all text into language file for easier internationalization

addons.description: Library Watchdog will watch your media sources for changes and automatically update the library when new files are added or removed. Update is instant.
addons.name: service.librarywatchdog
addons.news:
v1.1.1
- Fix startup error

v1.1.0
- Update dependencies
- Enable virtual filesystems nby fixing py3 unicode issues
- Update abortRequested() API calls

v1.0.0
- Remove script.module.pathtools and script.module.watchdog so they are correctly referenced upstream

v0.9.8
- convert addon to work on py3

v0.9.7
- increased number of possible custom sources to 10
addons.summary: Instant library update on file system changes

addons.description: Scans media sources for movies, TV shows and episodes that got missed during the library scan. This add-on can used to identify, play or manually add missing videos to your media library.
addons.name: plugin.video.mms
addons.news:
v4.1.0 (2020-04-05) by juokelis
- Ported to python 3.0 to run on v19 Matrix.

v4.0.5 (2016-01-17) by tamland
- Improved detection of bluray companion files.

addons.description: Library for building and parsing plugin URLs.
addons.name: script.module.routing

addons.name: metadata.thexem.de
